ds_grid_set: This function can be used to set a given cell within the given DS grid to any value, which can be a real number or a string. The image below illustrates this:
The x position of the cell to set.
The y position of the cell to set.
The value with which to set the cell.

{ANY_CODE} grid = ds_grid_create(5, 5);
var i = 0;
var j = 0;
repeat (ds_grid_width(grid))
{nbsp_x3}{
{nbsp_x3}repeat (ds_grid_height(grid))
{nbsp_x6}{
{nbsp_x6}ds_grid_set(grid, i, j, irandom(9));
{nbsp_x6}j += 1;
{nbsp_x6}}
{nbsp_x3}j = 0;
{nbsp_x3}i += 1;
}
The above code creates a grid and stores its index in the variable "grid". It then populates this grid with random integers from 0 to 9.
